options: ['The tape player is on the computer.', 'The schoolbag is under the chair.', 'The bed is green', 'A baseball is under the bed.']
questions: Which of the following is TRUE?
article:
Dear Eric,
How are you? This is a picture of my room. You can see a nice computer on my desk. It is my birthday present  from my uncle. A tape player is next to   the computer, and some tapes are on the computer. My school-bag is on the chair. My pencil-box and two books are in the schoolbag. And you can see a set of keys in the schoolbag, too. My bed is blue, and my green quilt is on it. Under the bed, you can see a baseball, and I can play it well. My books are in the bookcase, and my white model plane is in it, too. My room is tidy, isn't it?
Do you have a room? Can I have a picture of your room?
Yours,
Liu Peng
